phrases: A neutral country of 17 million people.
It is a world of magic.
Magic is bought and sold there every day.
It is an integral part of people's lives.
And there are those who use magic as their occupation.
Those people are referred to as wizards.
The wizards belong to various guilds and perform jobs on commission.
There are a large number of guilds within the country.
And in a certain city there lies a certain guild.
A guild from which various legends were once born...
Or rather, will continue to be born long into the future...
I will not give you the book!
I cannot believe that Daybreak contained this sort of secret!
Now that I have eaten, I am all revved up!
What the heck kind of wizard is he?
Guess I should go find Lucy.
A sophisticated, cultured individual such as me, myself and I?
Anyone who is happy to have a collection of those freakish maids is not cultured!
There is nothing to mock of my beautiful blond maids!
What kind of secret does this book hold?
Tell me or I will snap your arms in two!
This girly does not get her situation!
I got Kemu Zaleon himself to write that book for me!
Therefore any secret in that book is mine!
If you let me have this book, I will consider forgiving you.
I really want to smack you one, though.
For a bookworm you sure misuse language!
The tables have turned implies that you have the upper hand!
But having one extra cat on your side is not going to be able to defeat my Diver magic!
And that means Everlue is also a wizard?
It is written in this book!
A horrible adventure story with you as the main character, Everlue!
It is wonderful that I am the main character.
For Kemu Zaleon, of all people, to write such rubbish!
You forced him to write it!
It is an honor for someone to labor to write my book!
You blackmailed him to write it!
It was his own fault for refusing me in the first place!
I told him to write a book where I was the main character, but that idiot refused!
Write the book, or I will revoke the citizenship for your entire family!
If you did that, they would not be able to join the merchant of craftsman guilds!
Is the Count really that powerful?
I told you, I am a great man!
And in the end he wrote it!
But I was annoyed by his first refusal, so I made him write it in prison!
I am an author, he said!
But I broke that pride and haughty attitude of his!
How dare you do such things just to satisfy your own desires!
You put him in solitary confinement for three years!
Do you have any idea what he must have felt?
Perhaps he finally noticed how great I truly am?
He was fighting that pride of yours!
If he did not write it, his family would be in trouble.
But he could not allow himself, as an author, to write a book with you as the main character!
How do you know these things, you pest?
It is all written in this book!
I read that book as well.
Kemu Zaleon never appears in it.
It is true that if you read it normally, it is a work that would make any fan cry!
But you should know that Kemu Zaleon was originally a wizard!
He used up all his remaining strength, and cast a spell on this book.
When the spell ran out, it would turn into a book defaming me?
You have no imagination, have you?
It is true that this book contains everything about how it was written!
But the words that Kemu Zaleon left in this book were nothing so petty as that!
The real secret is something else!
That is why I am not going to let you have this book.
In fact, you never had a right to it in the first place!
Gate of the Giant Crab, I open thee!
Make sure to end all your sentences with -kani!
You are a crab after all!
If you do not shut it, he will pinch your paws.
Lucy, how would you like your hair done today...
Could you take a look at the situation, please?
Beat up that bald old man!
I thought it would be like a straight jab, but go figure, it turned out to be a hook.
Could it be he wrote down the illegal underbelly of my various business enterprises?
If she hands it over to the Council's inspection wizards...
That would be the end of me!
Gate of the Maiden, I open thee!
The same kind of magic as Lucy!
After she started moving again, I went to get her and...
I do not have a clue!
You mean you grabbed her, right?
He could not have come through the Spirit world with her, right?
You cannot run away digging any more holes!
Sir, what do you think of this look-ebi?
You did us Fairy Tail wizards proud.
But we ended up destroying things again.
The composition and style of this book is just awful.
There was no way I could image it having been written by Kemu Zaleon.
So that is why I thought there was some secret.
What is the meaning of this?
I am quite sure I requested that you destroy it.
Destroying it is a simple task.
You should be able to do it yourself, Mr. Kaby.
I do not even want to look at it!
I know why you cannot allow this book to exist.
It is to protect your father's honor.
You are Kemu Zaleon's son, are not you?
I could not bring myself to read it.
So that is why you wanted to burn it?
Burn it just because it is dumb?
Is not that going too far, man?!
It is to protect his honor.
I am ashamed that my father wrote Daybreak.
You did not contact us for three years!
Where in the world were you writing?
I am never writing another book!
Did not I tell you three years ago?
I told you that you would regret taking that commission for such a worthless book!
I finished that incredible piece of rubbish.
Thanks to that tripe you neglected your family for three years!
Kaby, I was always thinking of you.
Then why did not you write something decent and come straight home?
You abandoned your pride as an author and your family!
You were correct to quit being an author.
Someone with no pride like you is not fit to be one.
But as the months and years went by, the hatred I felt turned into remorse.
And yet, my father is no longer in this world to apologize to.
So I felt the least I could do to atone was to destroy this last, worst book of his.
I wanted to rid the world of it for the sake of my father's good name.
His real name was Zekua Melon!
He cast a spell on this book.
It is written to his beloved son, Kaby.
He cast a spell that rearranged the letters.
The reason he quit being an author is probably not because he wrote the most terrible book ever,
but because he wrote the most incredible one!
This incredible book is a letter to you, Mr. Kaby!
I was always thinking of you.
That is the true book that Kemu Zaleon left to you.
I cannot let this book be burned.
Guess we do not need that reward, then!
The request was to destroy the book.
And we did not complete it.
I mean, it is such a kind offer, so why do not we take him up on it?
So much for all those cool things you said before.
We do not want it, so that is that.
Go back to your real home.
Is it normal to just let 2,000,000 slide like that?
Taking money for a request that was not completed would damage Fairy Tail's good name.
But we did such a good job!
Those people were not even rich?
They said they just rented that house for appearances.
I would have taken the job even if they had not gone to all that trouble.
Oh yeah, how did you notice the house was not theirs?
They smelled different than the house.
Well, I am not an animal.
But I really look up to a writer like that.
It is a novel you are writing, is not it?
That is why you know all about books.
D-Do not tell a soul, okay?
I would just die of embarrassment if someone read it!
Do not worry, no one will.
That does not exactly make me feel better.
Wait a sec, are you sure this is the way?
Happy said to go this way, so this is the way we go, says I.
Cat's have an excellent sense of smell!
And what does smell have to do with direction?
Anyway, how about walking yourself, you lazy bum?
Is he looking for a fight?
Why is he in his underwear?
I was looking for a bathroom!
Why did you strip before you found one, jerk?
And there is no way there would be a bathroom in the forest anyway!
And were not you the one barging in when a guy's going to the bathroom, you bastard!
What are they, in third grade?
You are coming back from a job.
Cutting through this forest is a shortcut back to Magnolia, see.
You were bragging about your nose, but you did not even realize Gray was there?
There are some things you do not want to smell.
Get on back already by yourself.
It will be trouble if I do not get back soon.
The woman known as the most powerful wizard in Fairy Tail!
But I have never seen a picture of her in a magazine, so what kind of person is she?
But she is bigger than you would think!
It is about right if you are talking about how scary she is.
Actually, maybe it is even worse.
No, I think she could blow away a mountain into 3 pieces with a single kick!
Three pieces is exaggerating, I think it is more like two.
A woman that can blow a mountain in two with a single kick?
Anyway, we have got to hurry home.
We are going to get us some protein for once!
I am so sick of fruits and nuts!
Guess you are scared'because you will end up in our bellies!
I am not shaking because I am scared.
I have to go to the bathroom.
I might not be able to hold it in.
If that happens it will make me taste weird, I am sure.
You are still going on about that?
You have got our friend there, bub.
You may be hungry, but we cannot let you eat him.
I am going to be eaten by Lucy!
You will get an unexpected visitor.
The stars point to trouble with water and women.
He is not even using magic?
How dare you make my mouth all gritty!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
You do not have to get serious against these small fry.
How about I fry up that smart mouth of yours?
Not with those lukewarm flames of yours.
I cannot sense them anymore already.
I do not get this at all!
I did my best but it was all for nothing.
But it seems like they really appreciated it.
Just do your best for the reward in your next mission.
So then, what kind of outfit are you going to work in next?
I think she is got the wrong impression!
Look, I did not wear it because it is my style, it was...
After doing the maid thing, then it is a bunny girl or swimsuit next usually...
Listen to people when they are talking!
